alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Walker and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 617 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bankhead Lock And Dam, or 17 miles south of Cordova, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bessemer, Hueytown, Pleasant Grove, Brighton, Lipscomb, North Johns, Splash Adventure, Concord, Tutwiler, Weller and Little Shoal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
